definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Mr. Yang Dongtang, the chairman, cordial welcome personalities from all walks of life to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 董事长杨东堂先生诚挚欢迎各界人士莅临导。

sentences.english: A warm welcome society all sections of the people joins hands , shows great plans together.
sentences.chinese: 热情欢迎社会各界人士携手合作，共展宏图。

sentences.english: People who want to improve their English levels in a short time.
sentences.chinese: 想在短时刻内进步外语水平的各界人士。

sentences.english: The delegation met with people from all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 代表团接触了各界人士。

sentences.english: Dinggu Enterprise is ready to keep pace with the times, and create a wonderful future together with people of aall circles.
sentences.chinese: 顶固企业愿与社会各界人士与时俱进，共创美好将来。

sentences.english: The appearance of the automated collection bus causes a hot discussion in all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 无人售票车的出现引发了各界人士的热烈讨论。

sentences.english: I am glad to see people from all walks of life gather in Nagano to welcome the torch there.
sentences.chinese: 各界人士聚集长野欢迎火炬，对此我感到高兴。

sentences.english: We sincerely wish to provide excellent service to customers. The suggestion and guidance of people of all circles are cordially welcome.
sentences.chinese: 本公司竭诚为广大用户服务，欢迎各界人士莅临指导。

sentences.english: Warm welcome from all sectors come and cooperate.
sentences.chinese: 热情欢迎社会各界人士携手合作，共展宏图。

sentences.english: People from all walks of life gathered nationwide to celebrate the time-honored holiday.
sentences.chinese: 各界人士齐聚一堂，庆祝这个历史悠久的节日。

sentences.english: Citizens from different industries and areas contribute to the earthquake-stricken area enthusiastically.
sentences.chinese: 我市社会各界人士踊跃向地震灾区捐款献爱心。

sentences.english: Jinma sincerely hopes to cooperate with clients all over the world.
sentences.chinese: “金玛”愿与各界人士携手合作，共创辉煌。

sentences.english: Yang Dongtang, President, will give public figures a warm welcome.
sentences.chinese: 董事长杨东堂先生诚挚欢迎各界人士莅临导。

sentences.english: I also had a good exchange of views with people across a broad spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 我还同美国社会各界人士进行了很好的交流。

sentences.english: More than 300 Indian people from all walks of life attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 印度各界人士300余人出席了演讲会。

sentences.english: We shall welcome people of all walks of life to join Jinjiufu and to create a bright future together.
sentences.chinese: 热忱欢迎各界人士加入金九福，共创美好未来。

definition: all walks of life/all social circles
domestic and international/at home and abroad
Tongren county in Huangnan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 黃南藏族自治州|黄南藏族自治州[Huang2 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
to be present at a meeting
